Tag393.value: the Company currently holds the exclusive right to conduct, manage, organise and operate byany appropriate means seven numerical lottery games (JOKER, LOTTO, PROTO, EXTRA 5, SUPER 3, KINO &POWERSPIN), three sports andother betting games (PROPO, PROPOGOAL and STΟIΧIMA [which includesMONITOR GAMES and GO LUCKY]), two new lottery games (BINGO and SUPER 4) and “Prognostika AgononBasket”, “Prognostika Agonon Omadikon Athlimaton” (these last four games have not been launched yet).
